/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the city's daily life. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a canopy of green and concrete. Red lanterns hang from the buildings, adding a splash of color to the urban landscape. Cars and buses fill the road, indicating a busy time of day. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the action.
